topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5520de006368720f73bc0100#post_5520de006368720f73bc0100
Even if the events of the series don't end up on tv, you think anyone who witnessed these things could account for it
And a lot of people saw what these characters have done

But no one actually remembers


Like the episode where Goku and Piccolo go to get driver's licences
Does no one recognize the guy who looks almost exactly like, and shares the name of, the guy who almost enslaved and destroyed the world, King Picollo?
